ygData.subject: Re: Ring Recommendation
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve worn the 5ac, 55hps rings for a long time now, and recently upgraded to the velium 6ac, 65hp rings.  I keep some +7 all resist rings around for resistance
ygData.messageBody:
I've worn the 5ac, 55hps rings for a long time now, and recently
upgraded to the velium 6ac, 65hp rings. I keep some +7 all resist
rings around for resistance type situations.

BTW, didn't you guys hear? No one on Xegony is allowed to hit 53
until they get an extra Vox scale for me. :) Hmm... I just thought
of something... I've never been the eBaying kind of guy, but it may
just pay to buy a 52 account JUST to get the Vox Scale. Then again,
maybe there's already a Vox scale there. :)

/em rushes off.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
